collection:
This Policy describes the
types of information we may collect from you or that you may provide
(“Personal Information”) on the
[stockapi.ventura.kr](https://stockapi.ventura.kr) website (“Website” or
“Service”) and any of its related products and services (collectively,
“Services”), and our practices for collecting, using, maintaining, protecting,
and disclosing that Personal Information.

Contacting us

## Collection of information

Our top priority is customer data security and, as such, we exercise the no
logs policy.

We may process only minimal user data, only as much as it is
absolutely necessary to maintain the Website and Services.

Information
collected automatically is used only to identify potential cases of abuse and
establish statistical information regarding the usage and traffic of the
Website and Services.

We act in the capacity of a data controller when we ask
you to submit your Personal Information that is necessary to ensure your
access and use of the Website and Services.

In order to make the Website and Services available to you, or to meet a legal
obligation, we may need to collect and use certain Personal Information.

Any of the information we
collect from you may be used to help us run and operate the Website and
Services.

## Privacy of children

We do not knowingly collect any Personal Information from children under the
age of 18.

For these purposes, tracking refers to collecting personally identifiable
information from users who use or visit a website or online service as they
move across different websites over time.

Even so, as described in more detail throughout this Policy, we
limit our use and collection of your Personal Information.

We encourage you
to be aware when you leave the Website and Services and to read the privacy
statements of each and every resource that may collect Personal Information.
sharing:
## Disclosure of information

To maintain the highest level of privacy and to protect your Personal
Information to the full extent, we do not share your Personal Information with
anyone and for any reason.
